reuters.title: INTERNATIONAL KING'S <IKNG> NAMES PRESIDENT
reuters.body: International King's Table Inc said it named Everett F. Jefferson president and chief operating officer. The company said Jefferson was previously president and chief operating officer of Marriott Corp's <MHS> Straw Hat Pizza unit. It said he assumes the positions from Roger W. Houmes, who will continue as chairman and chief executive officer of the company, which operates a chain of 82 restaurants in the West. Reuter 
